column7: UTF-32 base64 the table become too wide  rewritten UTF-32 as a text below the table -->

column2: 1 for "direct characters" (depends on the encoder setting for some code points)  2 for U+002B "+"  otherwise same as for 000080 – 00FFFF
5 for an isolated case inside a run of single byte characters. For runs {{frac|2|2|3}} per character plus padding to make it a whole number of bytes plus two to start and finish the run
column5: 2–6 depending on if the byte values need to be escaped
column6: 4–6 for characters inherited from GB2312/GBK (e.g. most Chinese characters) 8 for everything else.
column7: {{frac|2|2|3}} for characters inherited from GB2312/GBK (e.g. most Chinese characters) {{frac|5|1|3}} for everything else.

column2: 8 for isolated case  {{frac|5|1|3}} per character plus padding to integer plus 2 for a run
column5: 8–12 depending on if the low bytes of the surrogates need to be escaped.
